q: and Laura Kenny , Lucy Garner and Harriet Owen each won a race at the last event, leaving Ruby Miller to pick up her points with high placings. Laura Kenny 's keen to get the edge over her fellow competitors, saying: the racing was good, i really enjoyed it. i was feeling a bit under the weather but the atmosphere and crowd picked me up. she continued: "i can beat Ruby Miller , and i'm getting better with each revolution. my training is now focussing on endurance not sprint so hopefully i can make up the remaining eight points." Sam Harrison

"because it would be the next game, and what we've always done is think about the next practice," Steve Fairchild said. we don't want to look beyond anything other than having a good week of practice and playing well next saturday. next saturday's game at wyoming has added meaning with the bronze boot, the traveling trophy awarded to the team winning the annual border war. wyoming was eliminated from bowl contention thursday in its loss to unlv,

Harry Markopolos became an adept hunter and fisherman as he grew up, like many from the rural area, but also showed early aptitude at academics, as well as a willingness to question authority. he used to challenge the teachers, his mother said with a laugh.
